name: consent-kit
description: A lightweight implementation of a GDPR compliant banner and modal in vanilla javascript.

scripts.buildjs: uglifyjs src/js/consent-kit.js -o dist/js/consent-kit.min.js -c && uglifyjs src/js/consent-kit.js -o dist/js/consent-kit.js
scripts.build: concurrently --kill-others "sass --style=compressed src/scss/consent-kit.scss dist/css/consent-kit.min.css && npm run-script buildjs" && cp -R dist/* docs/dist

author: Joeri Vlekken
